#summary List of Log events supported.
#labels Phase-Requirements

* Admin login
* Admin login failure
* DHCP IP: (192.168.0.100)
* DoS attack: ACK Scan (and other types)
* Initialized, firmware version: V1.0.0.70_1.0.18
* Internet connected
* Internet disconnected
* LAN access from remote
* Remote login
* Remote login failure
* Self2WAN ICMP type b Detected!
* Service blocked: ICMP_echo_req (and others)
* Time synchronized with NTP server
* UPnP set event: Public_UPNP_C3 (and others)
* email sent to: adress@host.com
